ðŸ“– Summary: Wolf is a streaming server designed for Moonlight that enables multiple users to stream different games or virtual desktops from a single server. It supports on-demand virtual desktop creation, multi-GPU utilization, and low-latency streaming, all within a Linux and Docker-centric environment. The project prioritizes configurability, allowing users to customize encoding pipelines and GPU settings.
